abstract: FairPoint Communications sought bankruptcy protection Monday after struggling to absorb phone lines purchased from Verizon Communications.
snippet: FairPoint Communications sought bankruptcy protection Monday after struggling to absorb phone lines purchased from Verizon Communications.
lead_paragraph: FairPoint Communications sought bankruptcy protection on Monday after struggling to absorb phone lines purchased from Verizon Communications, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: FairPoint, Buyer of Verizon Unit, Files for Chp. 11
